name: Linked Finance World
public_notice: Legend of Fantasy War has rebranded as Linked Finance World. For more info, refer to their Medium article.

description.en: Linked Finance World is a community-driven platform with a suite of leading products of decentralized applications (DApps) including DEX Aggregator, Launchpad, and various earn, stake yields products. Our mission is to link blockchain networks to enhance user experience and benefits.
